0.8.0.name: wordpress/my-twitter-ticker
0.8.0.description:
Wordpress port of very nice Twitter Ticker from Tutorialzine.com powered by jQuery & Twitter’s Search API.

It'll show your or your friends' latest tweets and will not require server side code or databases. The widget uses its own css file so it can be easily modified.

For more information and live demo visit the home page of this plugin.

Credit goes to Tutorialzine.com
